source.sqlReaderQuery:
with cte as(
SELECT 
	[Document No_],
      [Line No_],
      [Type],
      [No_],
      [Sell-to Customer No_],
      [Location Code],
      [Quantity],
      [Shipment Date],
      [Description],
      [Unit of Measure],
      [Quantity (Base)],
      [Unit Price],
      [Unit Cost (LCY)],
      [Amount],
      [Gross Weight],
      [Bill-to Customer No_],
      [GST Base Amount],
      [Posting Date],
      [Unit of Measure Code],
      [Amount To Customer],
      [TCS Nature of Collection],
      [Discount Structure Code],
      [Discount Structure Amount],
      [Scheme Reason],
      [Scheme Code],
      [Scheme Parent Item No_],
	'10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Cr_Memo Line]
where year([Posting Date]) >= 2020 
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[Document No_],
      [Line No_],
      [Type],
      [No_],
      [Sell-to Customer No_],
      [Location Code],
      [Quantity],
      [Shipment Date],
      [Description],
      [Unit of Measure],
      [Quantity (Base)],
      [Unit Price],
      [Unit Cost (LCY)],
      [Amount],
      [Gross Weight],
      [Bill-to Customer No_],
      [GST Base Amount],
      [Posting Date],
      [Unit of Measure Code],
      [Amount To Customer],
      [TCS Nature of Collection],
      [Discount Structure Code],
      [Discount Structure Amount],
      [Scheme Reason],
      [Scheme Code],
      [Scheme Parent Item No_],

SELECT

	[Sell-to Customer No_],

	[Shipment Date],
	[Location Code],

cte3 as (
select a.* From cte a left join cte2 b on a.[Document No_]=b.No_ and a.Site_Code = b.Site_Code
)

select * From cte3

select a.* from [dbo].[Sales_Cr_Memo_Line] a left join [dbo].[watermarkscml] b on a.Site_Code = b.Site_Code 
where a.[Posting Date] > b.Last_Modified_On

activities.name: get_all_files_lastmodified
activities.description: get all files lastmodified and use latest file to dump in a temp csv filr.
